definition: combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书[liu4 shu1] of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements/also known as joint ideogram or associative compounds/to comprehend without being told explicitly/to cotton on/knowing (smile, glance etc)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements/also known as joint ideogram or associative compounds

sentences.english: The driver grinned and gave me a thumbs-up sign.
sentences.chinese: 汽車司機會意地咧嘴一笑，向我豎起大拇指。

sentences.english: Then wed have some ideas of what youll be needing.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我們就會意中有點兒數，曉得你們需求什麼了。

sentences.english: When asked who sent them just give a knowing smile.
sentences.chinese: 當人家問你是誰送的時，只要回以一個會意的微笑。

sentences.english: "Yes, I know." She met his glance comprehendingly.
sentences.chinese: “是的，我知道，”她會意地迎着他的目光說。

sentences.english: The widespread concern is that a home-educated child misses out on"socialisation".
sentences.chinese: 人們普遍認爲在家教育孩子會錯失孩子的社會意識。

sentences.english: And chocolates and roses. When asked who sent them just give a knowing smile.
sentences.chinese: 當人家問你是誰送的時，只要回以一個會意的微笑。

sentences.english: The structure of social consciousness is unified by the duplicity and dual-structure.
sentences.chinese: 社會意識的結構是兩重性和兩層性的統一。

sentences.english: Andy catches Red's eye, nods his thanks.
sentences.chinese: 安迪用眼睛會意瑞德，並點頭致謝。

sentences.english: All there are its certain words to usually choose the principle in the course of topography in the understanding word.
sentences.chinese: 會意字在構形過程中都有其一定的字素選取原則。

sentences.english: Hill nodded, and gestured to the control room they had passed.
sentences.chinese: 希爾點頭，一個手勢會意着他們剛纔通過的指揮室。

sentences.english: She cast a sly glance at her bridge partner.
sentences.chinese: 她向橋牌搭擋使了個會意的眼色。

sentences.english: You are socially conscious and work well with high-minded groups with strong humanitarian ideals.
sentences.chinese: 具有社會意識並且和有人道主義理想的高尚團隊合作。

sentences.english: This generation attempts to be socially conscious in their decision-making process.
sentences.chinese: 這一代人試圖在他們的決策過程中加入社會意識。

sentences.english: Most of us at times blunder into accidentally hurting someone.
sentences.chinese: 我們大多數的人有時會意外地瞎闖而傷害到別人。

sentences.english: Frank laughed and began to tell us of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克會意而笑後就給我們講起了他的童年。

definition: Six Methods of forming Chinese characters, according to Han dictionary Shuowen 說文|说文 - namely, two primary methods: 象形 (pictogram), 指事 (ideogram), two compound methods: 會意|会意 (combined ideogram), 形聲|形声 (ideogram plus phonetic), and two transfer methods: 假借 (loan), 轉注|转注 (transfer)
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
established by popular usage (idiom); common usage agreement/customary convention
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
